title: SMC_KinConfigActivateAutomaticPeriods (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_KinConfigActivateAutomaticPeriods
This function block allows activating automatic periods on
rotary axes with multiple periods.  With automatic periods
active, instead of a specific period the closest period to the
current position is chosen when e.g. determining the target
position of a movement.
This function block does not change the state of an the
AxisGroup
.
Instead, a configuration based on
KinematicConfigIn
, but with
activated automatic periods, is prepared and written to
KinematicConfigOut
.
The function block
SMC_SetKinConfiguration
can be used to change
the configuration of the axis group to this value.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axis

rows.Name: ConfigDataOut
rows.Comment: The output config data with activated automatic periods.

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Converts the config data on rising edge

rows.Name: Done
rows.Comment: The config data has been converted successfully

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
